script.name: NoResourceOpenAvailable
script.description: Used for finding open and available work items for all resources.

script_line.statement: SELECT DEFAULT_WORK_COLUMNS [lf] FROM WP_WORK_ITEM wpwork [lf] LEFT OUTER JOIN WP_WORK_ITEM_PART wppart ON wppart.ACTI_ID=wpwork.ACTI_ID AND wppart.ACTI_DB=wpwork.ACTI_DB AND wppart.WI_ITERATION=wpwork.WI_ITERATION [lf] INNER JOIN WP_PROCI wpjob ON wpwork.PROCI_ID=wpjob.PROCI_ID AND wpwork.PROCI_DB=wpjob.PROCI_DB [lf] INNER JOIN WP_PROCI_NODE wpnode ON wpwork.ACTI_ID=wpnode.ACTI_ID AND wpwork.ACTI_DB=wpnode.ACTI_DB [lf] WHERE wpjob.PROC_STATE_ID=2 [lf] AND (wpwork.WORK_STATE_ID=3 OR wpwork.WORK_STATE_ID=4) [lf] GROUP BY DEFAULT_WORK_GROUP_BY [lf] ORDER BY WORK_STATE_ID DESC, PRIORITY ASC, ACTI_ID ASC
